title: COMMUNITY MADE CHAMPION?
body:
It's pretty self explanatory, people submit champion ideas/drawings and then the riot crew chooses like 5 or 10 of those ideas then the community votes on which one should be created!

Just an idea.

Blue Yetti-

replies.body: Well, we have the whole board filled with people champions. It makes sense to have this one have multiple people brainstorm ideas whilst others work on designs, lore, quotes, etc. and others working on scaling and all the math crap to make sure it isnt broken as heck

how is it community made if 1 person designed a new champion?
i was thinking that everyone would help create the design, abilities and lore, for a champion.
